reviewText: Parrots, The How To Of Caring, Choosing, Understanding & Training Obviously biradearaujo has NOT seen the entire DVD. There are plenty of helpful tips on choosing, raising, caring, & training pet parrots on this rather lengthy DVD. Yes it's entertaining, but it's much more than that. The fact that he gave it 3 stars alone, says that. Of course, if there is a more detailed and informative DVD out there, I would like to know about it.

There are a lot better products in the market, done with true expertise and no speculation. This video does entertain but leaves a lot to desire. It may serve as an aid for a beginer with large birds.
